name: 魏敏樺
objective: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入,作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值,以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為,以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為.內容包括:波傳遞理論,土壤的動力性質,土壤的液化,基礎的振動問題,等等..
schedule:
1. Introduction.
2. Seismic hazard awareness: a historical perspective.
3. Fundamentals of vibration analysis (1- and 2-D.O.F.).
4. Wave in elastic medium.
5. Properties of dynamically loaded soils.
6. Field/Laboratory measurements of dynamic and cyclic soil properties.
7. Dynamic bearing capacity of shallow foundations.
8. Lateral earth pressure on retaining wall.
9. Earthquake.
10. Seismic stability of earth embankments.
scorePolicy:
Homework　　　　　　: 20%
Quizzes 　　　　　　: 20%
Papers Presentation　　: 10%
Midterm & Final Exams　　: 2x25%
materials:
1. Braja, M. Das (1993). Principles of Soil Dynamics. PWS-KENT Publishing Company.
2. Steven L. Kramer (1996). Geotechnical Earthquake Engineering. Prentice Hall. 3. Bolt, Bruce (1988). Earthquakes. WH Freeman & Co.
4. Bolton, H. Seed & I M Idriss (1982). Ground motions and soil liquefaction during earthquakes. Earthquake Engineering Research Institute, Berkeley California.
5. Lectures notes
